title: Handkerchief, 1900–50
medium:
Medium: cotton on linen
Technique: satin, stem, speckling and couching stitches with areas of deflected element work and cutwork with insertions on a plain weave foundation
description: Handkerchief with a pattern of scrolls and flower sprays.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, 1900–50.
1900–50. Medium: cotton on linen
Technique: satin, stem, speckling and couching stitches with areas of deflected element work and cutwork with insertions on a plain weave foundation. Gift of Stanley Herzman. 1976-92-7.
